channel.title: Graduate-School on John-Henry Pezzuto

item.title: Steve Levittâ€™s Graduate School Advice
item.description: When I lived at Chicago I was able to catch up Steve Levitt with a small group of students talk about his opinions on going to graduate school. His advice was tailored towards economics students, but I think other people will may find it valuable as well. He started by saying that our presumption that being a professor at a top school is correct. Being a top professor is indeed a awesome job.
